about_the_game:
What is the game about:

After a cataclysmic event rendered Earth uninhabitable, humanity was forced to flee their home planet in search of a new beginning. After centuries of interstellar travel, they discovered several planets suitable for colonization. However, these new worlds were barren and resource-poor, forcing humanity to resort to scavenging for survival. As a Star Scavenger, you are at the forefront of this struggle, venturing into the unknown to secure the resources necessary for humanity's survival.

Core Gameplay:

  • Exploration: Discover new planets and uncover hidden resources.

  • Collection: Gather a variety of scrap to complete your objectives.

  • Combat: Fight off dangerous alien creatures to protect yourself and your team.

  • Survival: Adapt to harsh environments and overcome numerous challenges.

Key Features:

  • Time is of the Essence: Each planet has its own unique time dilation, forcing you to work swiftly and efficiently.

  • Teamwork: Coordinate with your crew to overcome the challenges of each mission.

  • Diverse Planets: Explore a variety of alien worlds, each with its own unique environments and dangers.

  • Abundant Loot: Collect a wide range of scrap, from common metals to rare energy crystals.

  • Intense Combat: Engage in thrilling battles against ferocious alien creatures.

Join us and become a Star Scavenger. The fate of humanity rests in your hands!

Join Discord:

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: Outer Express

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: 500 years after Earth's destruction, humanity scours desolate planets for resources. As a Star Scavenger, lead your team on dangerous expeditions to collect valuable scrap within a limited time. Race against the clock, outwit deadly aliens, and work together to survive and complete the mission.
